item.title: code for microbiota analysis in R
item.description: Inspired by Riffomonas 0. Before you start 0.1 Set working directory setwd(dir = "~/Documents/mothur exercise/rmarkdown/") ~ meaning: root 0.2 Two Sets of Files needed for analysis File origin File type Notes Mothur axes file ended with “.ave.pcoa.axes” tsv(Tab Separated Values)file Mothur summary file ended with “ave-std.summary” convert format into xls, csv, or tsv before importing Mothur summary file ended with “tax.

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.
